title: Claiming His Valentine
description: She’s too innocent, too perfect for a big roughneck like me.I don’t let people get close to me anymore. Not since the accident.I used my fortune to build a home in the mountains, seeking refuge from the tragedy that tore me apart.But then a young woman with heart-shaped candy red lips shows up on my security camera.And she is in trouble .I haven’t left my fortress in so long.But for her, I’ll brave the storm.She's been my obsession for a year, and now she's mine.I'll be her first - and I don't care if it's wrong.No-holds-barred hot romance. Not realistic but not entirely implausible, either. Enjoy ;)This book was previously titled Mountain Man's Valentine, so please take care when borrowing or purchasing! :)
author: Lauren Milson
